title.rendered: 75-inch Smart TV for less than 1,000 euros?  It is possible with this offer

content.rendered:
Originally when it went on sale in April 2021, this Samsung QE75Q75A it cost 1,999 euros. A year later, it can already be yours at half price and lowering the barrier of 1,000 euros. The “Internet Week” of El Corte Inglés continues and now you can get this Samsung QLED television at an irresistible price.

75-inch QLED Smart TV

The Smart TV we are talking about has a screen of no less than 75 inches (189 centimeters diagonal). Its panel is of the QLED type, the inorganic Quantum dot technology converts light into more than a billion colors at any brightness level, ensuring 100% of the color volume according to the DCI-P3 standard.

Quantum Dot Colors

QLED televisions have the advantage of displaying content for long periods of time without having to worry about screen marking, as they are inorganic and durable materials, which allows a longer tv life.

QuantumHDR 10+ brings out detail and contrast so you can experience its full power in every image. Going beyond standards, HDR10+ Dynamic Tone Mapping creates deeper blacks, more vibrant images and previously unseen details.

Samsung’s 4K processor optimizes the quality of the image and sound of the content you are playing, transforming the image to 4K quality regardless of the source of your content. Also its Artificial Intelligence is reflected in Adaptive Picture, which automatically adjusts brightness and contrast of each scene based on ambient lighting.

Quality also in sound

Of course, the image is important, but this Samsung QE75Q75A is not far behind in the sound section. With SpaceFit Sound you enjoy optimized sound adapted to your space. Thanks to sensors that detect the environment, QLED TVs adjust the parameters for a better sound experience.

Measurements Samsung QE75Q75A

The Active Voice Amplifier (AVA) identifies potentially disturbing noises around you in real time and automatically raises the volume of dialogue, adding clarity to voices.

As part of this Internet Week promotion, this Smart TV has reduced its price from 1,849 euros to €999 current, a 46% discount.

The articles listed contain an affiliate link that reports to ADSLZone a small commission for each purchase. The products that appear here have been chosen by the editors for being discounted, and their appearance here has nothing to do with any agreement with the brands.
